about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of a talented violinist and conquer different levels with classical music from various authors and composers, from the Baroque to the Romantic era.

The Violinist offers players the options of pressing buttons to the rhythm of the music they choose. The notes will fall vertically and the player must press them at the right time to score points. The more accurate they are, the more points they will earn.

The demo version includes 8 carefully selected test pieces to offer a variety of genres and different difficulty levels.

Main features of the demo version:

First person mode for an immersive experience
6 test pieces for all skill levels
Intuitive controls that are easy to learn and difficult to master
Vibrant graphics that transport you to the world of music
